ygData.msgSnippet: Add job directory works like the form at the bottom of the engine page, letting you point the engine at a pre-existing job directory (perhaps already with

Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Why Do we need "Add Job Directory API" (Heritrix
 rest API) ?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=J35J0_yfeEKzhlLvbTM-olKHBY7VrP22MTk2NgPXOQ3U
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

'Add job directory' works like the form at the bottom of the engine 
page, letting you point the engine at a pre-existing job directory 
(perhaps already with configuration, prior-crawl state, etc.) at any 
reachable path. 'Create' only creates a new directory with defaults in 
the standard place.

- Gordon

On 9/20/12 10:51 AM, badal301 wrote:
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.x+API+Guide
>
>  I am following this document to learn about heritrix rest APIs.
>
> and I am quite confuse about why do we need "Add Job Directory API",
> because when we create job using "Create Job API" this creates job
> directory under heritrix home with cxml file.
>
> then why do we need Add Job Directory API ? (as create Job API is
> already doing this).
>
> Thank You Badal
>
